query:
-- Configurações de backup
SELECT id, tenant_id, enabled, frequency, schedule_time, retention_days, encryption_enabled, notify_on_success, notify_on_failure FROM backup_config LIMIT 5;

-- Últimos 15 backups
SELECT * FROM backup_history ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 15;

-- Estatísticas gerais
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_backups,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sucesso,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as falhas,
  MIN(created_at) as primeiro_backup,
  MAX(created_at) as ultimo_backup
FROM backup_history;
